q: . The biggest news is that children from the age of 12 will be able to compete and the winner will receive a$ 5 million record deal. In a statement, Simon Cowell said: I like the idea that a 12 year old on this show can compete with an older singer and a singing group, I've never believed there should be a cut-off age for talent, and we are going to put our money where our mouths are with the$ 5 million recording contract. "I'm doing this show in America because I genuinely believe we can find a superstar.
